name: Cucumber Pasta Salad
description: This cucumber pasta salad is perfect for your next potluck or BBQ! It's creamy, fresh, refreshing, and completely vegan. And it comes together in just 15 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups unsweetened coconut or soy yogurt
1  red onion, cut into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Rinse with cold water after cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Rinse with cold water after cooking.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the cucumber and cut the red onion into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Thinly slice the cucumber and cut the red onion into thin strips.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the dill and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the dill and mince the garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients for the sauce into a small bowl and stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all ingredients for the sauce into a small bowl and stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a large bowl, add the sauce, and toss to combine. Serve immediately or store in the fridge for later. I think it tastes best when it sits for about 30-60 minutes after adding the sauce.
